name: Delay Your Death
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50 (Jam) with the theme 'Delay the inevitable'.

You are always pushed to the right by the wind. This way you can only end up dying at some time. 

That's no problem however, because when you delay your death enough a portal to the next stage appears.

CONTROLS

w & s to move vertically

or 

up arrow & down arrow to move vertically
